Andy Coulson , 43, has denied knowledge of illegal activities, but he left the paper saying he took responsibility for what happened on his watch. I stand by what I've said about those events, but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on, said Andy Coulson , who had worked for David Cameron for 3 1/2 years. Andy Coulson was "a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication," David Cameron said.

38th annual March for life on the National Mall in Washington on Monday, Jan. 24, 2011.( AP Photo/Alex Brandon)- Rep. Steve King Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) told pro-life activists in Washington on Monday that a nation that will not stand for life will not stand for long.
